## ChannelClient.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Create a new instance of the Channel Client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(provider: ChannelProviderInterface);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  provider | [ChannelProviderInterface](./iframe-channel-provider.channelproviderinterface.md) | An instance of the @<!-- -->statechannels/iframe-channel-provider class, suitably configured |

## Remarks

It is possible to pass in a [fake channel provider](./channel-client.fakechannelprovider.md)<!-- -->, which simulates the behaviour of a wallet without requiring an iframe or browser. Useful for development.
